Document Text: A bill to authorize the Small Business Administration to participate in the purchase of eligible securities issued by qualified commercial banks or qualified mutual savings banks.

Question: On the Conference Report H.R. 2100
Document Text: A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1992 and 1993 for military functions of the Department of Defense and to prescribe military personnel levels for fiscal years 1992 and 1993, and for other purposes.

Question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 1394 to S.Amdt. 1393 to H.J.Res. 157 (Dire Emergency Supplemental Appropriations and Transfers for Relieffrom the Effects of Natural Disasters, for Other Urgent Needs, and forIncremental Costs of 'Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm' Act of 1992)
Document Text: To increase the rate of price support for milk and establish a surplus reduction program for the production of milk and products of milk.

Question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 1405 to H.J.Res. 157 (Dire Emergency Supplemental Appropriations and Transfers for Relieffrom the Effects of Natural Disasters, for Other Urgent Needs, and forIncremental Costs of 'Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm' Act of 1992)
Vote Title: Motion To Table D'Amato Amendment No. 1405
Document Text: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the classification of certain motor vehicles.

Question: On the Decision of the Chair S.Amdt. 1407 to H.J.Res. 157 (Dire Emergency Supplemental Appropriations and Transfers for Relieffrom the Effects of Natural Disasters, for Other Urgent Needs, and forIncremental Costs of 'Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm' Act of 1992)
Vote Title: Shall Decision Of The Chair Stand
Document Text: To limit the use of funds for carrying out any Department of Defense policy that prohibits certain abortions overseas.

Question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 1409 to H.J.Res. 157 (Dire Emergency Supplemental Appropriations and Transfers for Relieffrom the Effects of Natural Disasters, for Other Urgent Needs, and forIncremental Costs of 'Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm' Act of 1992)
Vote Title: Motion To Table Specter Amendment No. 1409
Document Text: To provide an incentive for increased consumer spending and to provide a short-term economic stimulus by waiving the penalty under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 on certain withdrawals from pension plans which are used to purchase consumer goods and other items and by extending for 1 year the research and experimentation tax credit, the low-income housing tax credit, the mortgage revenue bond tax provisions, and the targeted jobs tax credit.

Question: On the Joint Resolution H.J.Res. 157
Document Text: A joint resolution making dire emergency supplemental appropriations and transfers for relief from the effects of natural disasters, for other urgent needs, and for incremental costs of "Operation Desert Sheild/Desert Storm" for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.

Question: On the Cloture Motion S.Res. 198
Document Text: A resolution amending Senate Resolution 62 of the One Hundred Second Congress to authorize the Committee on Foreign Relations to exercise certain investigatory powers in connection with its inquiry into the release of the United States hostages in Iran.

Question: On the Conference Report H.R. 2521
Document Text: A bill making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.

Question: On the Resolution of Ratification Treaty Doc. 102-8
Document Text: The Treaty on Conventional Armed Forces in Europe (CFE), with Protocols on Existing Types (with Annex), Aircraft Reclassification, Reduction, Helicopter Recategorization, Information Exchange (with Annex), Inspection, the Joint Consultative Group, and Provisional Application; all signed at Paris on November 19, 1990
Result: Resolution of Ratification Agreed to (90-4, 2/3 majority required)

Question: On the Resolution of Ratification S.Amdt. 1439 to H.R. 3807 (Conventional Forces in Europe Treaty Implementation Act of 1991)
Document Text: To provide for the use of Department of Defense resources for destroying Soviet nuclear and other weapons.

Question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 1444 to H.R. 3807 (Conventional Forces in Europe Treaty Implementation Act of 1991)
Document Text: To eliminate a critical threat to nuclear nonproliferation efforts by safeguarding dangerous weapons usable materials from United States and Soviet warheads.

Question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 1443 to H.R. 3807 (Conventional Forces in Europe Treaty Implementation Act of 1991)
Document Text: To express the sense of the Senate that the President should promptly consult with Congress for the purpose of preparing a comprehensive plan entitled "International Investment for Democracy" that would assist the Soviet republics to avoid social chaos and achieve economic and political stability.

Question: On the Conference Report H.R. 2950
Document Text: A bill to develop a national intermodal surface transportation system, to authorize funds for construction of highways, for highway safety programs, and for mass transit programs, and for other purposes.

Question: On the Cloture Motion H.R. 3371
Document Text: A bill to control and prevent crime.

Question: On the Conference Report S. 543
Document Text: An Act to reform Federal deposit insurance, protect the deposit insurance funds, recapitalize the Bank Insurance Fund, improve supervision and regulation of insured depository institutions, and for other purposes.

Question: On Passage of the Bill H.R. 3435
Document Text: A bill to provide funding for the resolution of failed savings associations and working capital for the Resolution Trust Corporation, to restructure the Oversight Board and the Resolution Trust Corporation, and for other purposes.
